TextBlock.Text: NOMAI A: What is this place? We're really gonna do a challenge here?
NOMAI B: Yeah, Mr. Wreath said that he would give $1,000,000,000 to the last clan standing.
NOMAI A: By my guess, we're probaly gonna have to do a long challenge here. Spanning over generations.
NOMAI B: That begs the question, how will Mr. Wreath give us the money if we're gonna die?
NOMAI C: We'll do it for the generations to come! (loud obnoxious sounds)
NOMAI B: Well, when the dropship's ready, we'll head to the middle planet. Ideally on the south pole, because there will always be light.
